title: WHAT is this??????!!!
body: **I'm extremely mad at the moment since I was using a pair of Bluetooth head headphones during my game, and when I disconnect them, my game crashed out of nowhere, and I had to shut down my pc to fix it! I have never seen this happened before please explain, and it crashes a second after I disconnected my Bluetooth headphones. I just want to know what caused this, if it wasn't my headphones than what?!{{champion:79}} **

replies.body: Your sound drivers or whatever audio software you use.
Now it keeps saying its offline, and my connection is just fine, I dont know whats going on, ah Im done.
